name: The Last Tree (itch) (aposs)
description:
Humans have polluted all of the world, the end of civilization is near. Luckily the trees have decided that they don’t want to face extinction and have come up with a solution. They have joined forces from all over the planet and with their strength they have given life to a special, magical tree that will fight to make the Earth green again. 

Defeat the dangerous deforestators and polluting airplanes with the help of your own apples and other trees that will defend you.
